dialogue: How long was that movie supposed to be, anyway?
She'll be home soon. Pimpão must've dropped the others off first.
I don't know.
Everyone to bed. Now.
Do you?
Next year she'll start college. You know how that goes.
Do I?
She'll get involved in student politics, the way she is.
Let them settle down first. Then we'll see. No rush.
Why are Gaspa and Dalva leaving all of a sudden, then?
Gaspa's paranoid. Thinks he's being watched.
Let's send her with them. At least until this phase is over.
It'll pass soon. Remember the macrobiotic phase? Lasted two weeks.
Yeah, but no one gets arrested for being macrobiotic. The telephone rings. Rubens spits into the sink and hurries over to pick it up on the nightstand.
Hello? Speaking. Just a minute.
Work. I'll go pick it up in my study. Hang up for me, will you?
What about Vera?
I'll talk to Gaspa. We'll figure something out. Don't worry.
...If I'm not here, you can leave it at the office downtown. You have the address, right?
We'll talk tomorrow.
Might I know what you're doing up at this time of night?
Have you seen Veroca?
I'll find her, don't worry.
Can you believe our Vera's going away?
Soon it'll be just you and me.
Expecting someone?
Just a sec.
If I don't organize these photos once and for all, I'm going to get hopelessly mixed up.
Can’t we put air conditioning in the kids' room?
The house will be breezy.
Pick it up, honey.
I'm playing.
Hello? That's right, at the corner of Almirante Guimarães. We'll be here all afternoon. Thanks.
Is there a good movie at the Pax?
We have dinner at Dalal's. Boca didn't say?
We can go to the movies afterward.
Where are you going?
To start the soufflé.
